Modal

Interactive Modal

You have requested a revision to product:
#2000000051 | fc-100-10-20-14

Please give a reason for your revision request below.

                                            
<!-- on the root element set the dir attribute for rtl display format -->
<html lang="en" dir="rtl">
    [code goes here]
</html>

<button class="cmx-button ripple" onClick="launchModal('#interactiveModal')">Launch Modal</button>
<div id="interactiveModal" class="cmx-modal cmx-modal--interactive hidden">
    <div class="cmx-modal__container">
        <button class="cmx-modal__close-button" onClick="closeModal()">
            <span class="cmx-icon-close" aria-hidden="true"></span>
            <span class="sr-only">Close</span></span>
        </button>
        <div class="cmx-modal__content">
            <div class="cmx-modal__section cmx-has-separator">
                <h3 class="text-center">You have requested a revision to product: <br />
                    <span class="roboto-bold">#2000000051  | fc-100-10-20-14</span>
                </h3>
                <h3 class="text-center">
                    Please give a reason for your revision request below.
                </h3>
            </div>
            <div class="cmx-modal__section">
                <div class="cmx-form-group">
                    <label class="margin-vertical-md font-medium">Please Provide Reasoning for Request</label>
                    <textarea class="cmx-form-control" placeholder="Examples: Different pricing shown than was agreed upon with sales representitve, need more quantity and would like to see if there is a different price for larger volume, etc."></textarea>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="cmx-modal__section">
                <div class="text-left">
                    <button class="cmx-button cmx-button--support">Cancel</button>
                    <button class="cmx-button cmx-button--primary">Submit</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    
    
// START MODALS PAGE

// _modal-rtl.scss


html[dir="rtl"] .cmx-modal{
    // we set the backdrop styles here
    top:0;
    right:0; // modified
    left: auto; // added

    &__close-button{
        left:24px; // modified
        right: auto; // added
        top:24px; 
    }
}


// END MODALS PAGE

Confirmation Modal

Your revision request has been submitted.
CEMEX will respond to you within 48 hours with a decision on the request.

    [code goes here]
</html>

<button class="cmx-button ripple" onClick="launchModal('#confirmationModal')">Launch Modal</button>
<div id="confirmationModal" class="cmx-modal cmx-modal--confirmation hidden">
    <div class="cmx-modal__container">
        <button class="cmx-modal__close-button" onClick="closeModal()">
            <span class="cmx-icon-close" aria-hidden="true"></span>
            <span class="sr-only">Close</span></span>
        </button>
        <div class="cmx-modal__section">
                <div class="icon-accepted-ok cmx-confirmation__icon  cmx-icon-accepted-ok"></div>
                <h3 class="cmx-confirmation__message">
                Your revision request has been submitted. <br />
                CEMEX will respond to you within 48 hours with a decision on the request.
            </h3>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Informational Modal

Terms + Conditions

9. DELIVERY AND INDEMNIFICATION. Seller's responsibility for delivery shall cease FOB shipping point or, if Seller agrees to deliver FOB delivery site, at the curbside or street or frontage of the address of delivery. If Buyer requires Seller to cross a curb line or enter upon private property to make delivery on site, Buyer shall be responsible to provide safe and adequate access and such delivery shall be at the risk of Buyer. Following delivery, Buyer shall be responsible for compliance with all governmental regulations and ordinances with regard to disposal, storage or placement of the same and shall indemnify and hold Seller harmless against all claims for personal injuries, including death, and any damage to private or public property arising from the delivery, storage, use, disposal or handling of said Materials. Unless otherwise specifically agreed, shipments will be made only during normal business hours, but not Saturdays, Sundays, or holidays recognized by Seller or labor unions under contract with Seller. If Buyer is in default under this Agreement or any of its contracts or obligations with Seller, Seller may, at its sole option and without prejudice to any of its other remedies: (i) postpone further deliveries or shipments until such default is remedied; or (ii) terminate any and all obligations under any contract or obligation and refuse further performance without any liability to Buyer.

10. TITLE OF SECTION Seller's responsibility for delivery shall cease FOB shipping point or, if Seller agrees to deliver FOB delivery site, at the curbside or street or frontage of the address of delivery. If Buyer requires Seller to cross a curb line or enter upon private property to make delivery on site, Buyer shall be responsible to provide safe and adequate access and such delivery shall be at the risk of Buyer. Following delivery, Buyer shall be responsible for compliance with all governmental regulations and ordinances with regard to disposal, storage or placement of the same and shall indemnify and hold Seller harmless against all claims for personal injuries, including death, and any damage to private or public property

        <button class="modal__close-button" onClick="closeModal()">
            <span class="cmx-icon-close" aria-hidden="true"></span>
            <span class="sr-only">Close</span></span>
        </button>
        <div class="modal__section flex flex--column">
            <h3 class="margin-bottom flex__item--fixed">Terms + Conditions</h3>
            <div class="flex__item position--relative">
                <div class="scroller scroller--fade-bottom scroller--border-top">
                    <div class="scroller__content">

Unless otherwise specifically agreed, shipments will be made only during normal business hours, but not Saturdays, Sundays, or holidays recognized by Seller or labor unions under contract with Seller. If Buyer is in default under this Agreement or any of its contracts or obligations with Seller, Seller may, at its sole option and without prejudice to any of its other remedies: (i) postpone further deliveries or shipments until such default is remedied; or (ii) terminate any and all obligations under any contract or obligation and refuse further performance without any liability to Buyer.</p>

                        <div class="spacer-16"></div>

                        <p><span class="roboto-medium">10. TITLE OF SECTION</span> Seller's responsibility for delivery shall cease FOB shipping point or, if Seller agrees to deliver FOB delivery
                        site, at the curbside or street or frontage of the address of delivery. If Buyer requires Seller to cross a curb line or enter upon private property to make delivery on site, Buyer shall be responsible to provide safe and adequate access and such delivery shall be at the risk of Buyer. // _chat-rtl.scss is the partial controlling the chat rtl display

html[dir="rtl"] .chat{
    &__input{

        input[type="text"] {
        }

        button{
            left: 1.5rem; // modified
            right: auto; // added;
        }
    }
    
    &__entry {

        &:nth-child(even){

            .chat__entry-content {
                float: left; // modified
            }
        }
        &:nth-child(odd){
            .chat__entry-body {
                &::before {
                    left: auto; // modified
                    right: 100%; // modified
                    border-right: 8px solid #F4F6F9; // modified
                    border-left: transparent; // modified
                }   
            }
        }

        &-content {
            float: right; // modified
        }
        &-header {
            float: right; // modified
    
            .time {
                float: right; // modified
            }
        
            .author {
                float: left; // modified
            }
        }
        &-body {
            &::before {
                right: auto; // modified
                left: 100%; // modified
                border-left: 8px solid $bright-blue; // modified
                border-right: transparent; // modified
            }
        }
    }
}


// change the look of the chat-modal on small screens

@media (max-width: 48rem) {

    html[dir="rtl"] .chat{

        &__entry {

            float: left; // modified

            &:nth-child(even){
                .chat__entry{
                    &-content {
                        float: left; // modified
                        margin-left: 10px; // modified
                        margin-right: 0; // added
                    }
                    &-body {
                        &::before {
                            left: auto; // modified
                            right: 100%; // modified
                            border-right: 8px solid $bright-blue; // modified
                            border-left: transparent; // modified
                        }
                    }
                }
            } 

            &:nth-child(odd){
                .chat__entry{
                    &-content {
                        margin-right: 10px; // modified
                        margin-left: 0; // added
                    }
                    &-body {
                        &::before {
                            right: auto; // modified
                            left: 100%; // modified
                            border-left: 8px solid #F4F6F9; // modified
                            border-right: transparent; // modified
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

// end .modal-chat
